metadata.title: CVE-2021-21435 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Article Bcc fields and agent personal information are shown when customerprints the ticket (PDF) via external interface. This issue affects: OTRS AGOTRS 7.0.x version 7.0.23 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.10 andprior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
